entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
